author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-1193. Applied patch with slight modifications. Improves assembly and izpack plugins, and the izpack config files in the installer assembly

author: crogers
msg: Fix for http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/BEEHIVE-1020 - Move the persisting of ScopedRequest attributes out of the beehive NetUI layer.

I changed to the ScopedRequest interface and the NetUI implementation to deprecate persistAttributes()/restoreAttributes() and add new methods, getAttributeMap()/setAttributeMap(). Also updated the mock portal code to exercise the new methods and manage the persisting of attributes outside the beehive layer.
